==== Ubuntu 18.04 LTS Release Party (at Seoul, Daejeon, Busan) ====
* <nowiki>[[ https:--forum.ubuntu-kr.org-viewtopic.php?f=2&t=29911 | Forum Announcement ]]</nowiki>
* Reports : <nowiki>[[ https:--community.ubuntu.com-t-ubuntu-18-04-lts-release-party-in-korea-at-3-different-cities-5558-2 | Community Hub ]]</nowiki> / <nowiki>[[ http:--blog.ubuntu-kr.org-2018-05-01-ubuntu-bionic-beaver-party-korea.html | Blog ]]</nowiki>
* Seoul
** Date : 28th, Apr, 2018
** <nowiki>[[  http:--loco.ubuntu.com-events-ubuntu-ko-3729-ubuntu-1804-lts-release-party-seoul- | View at LoCo Portal]]</nowiki> / <nowiki>[[ https:--photos.app.goo.gl-eEswMXx4b2zNNNCv5 | Photos]]</nowiki> 
** Junhyun Bae talked about Ubuntu server tips like fine dust.
** Youngbin Han talked about What's new in Ubuntu 18.04 LTS
** Sungguk Yoon talked about A Story about container which is not related to VM
** Hoehyung Jung reported the results of C++ basic group study
** Kim Kwangyeon reported the status of the Hanjp-IM Project
** Venue sponsored by WhaTap Labs
* Daejeon
** Date : 29th, Apr, 2018
** <nowiki>[[  http:--loco.ubuntu.com-events-ubuntu-ko-3730-ubuntu-1804-lts-release-party-daejeon- | View at LoCo Portal]]</nowiki> / <nowiki>[[ https:--photos.app.goo.gl-kNiPSv1A8KAgPw1X7 | Photos]]</nowiki> 
** A portluck party was held to celebrate new LTS release.
** Attendees talked about new LTS release and memory leak bug recently found in GNOME.
* Busan
** Date : 28th, Apr, 2018
** <nowiki>[[ https:--photos.app.goo.gl-Sz3ik2utjHwKK9He2 | View at LoCo Portal]]</nowiki> / <nowiki>[[ http:--loco.ubuntu.com-events-ubuntu-ko-3733-ubuntu-1804-lts-release-party-busan- | Photos]]</nowiki> 
** A Tea Time party was held to celebrate new LTS release.

==== MeltingCon 2018 ====
* Date : 26th, May, 2018
* <nowiki>[[ https:--forum.ubuntu-kr.org-viewtopic.php?f=2&t=29944 | Forum Announcement ]]</nowiki> / <nowiki>[[  http:--loco.ubuntu.com-events-ubuntu-ko-3751-meltingcon-2018- | View at LoCo Portal]]</nowiki> / <nowiki>[[ https:--photos.app.goo.gl-zjDMerwq8kmJm68i1 | Photos]]</nowiki> / <nowiki>[[  https:--meltingcon.github.io-2018 | Website & Sponsors]]</nowiki>

==== Ubuntu Fest in Daejeon ====
* Date : 23th, June, 2018
* <nowiki>[[ https:--forum.ubuntu-kr.org-viewtopic.php?f=2&t=29953 | Forum Announcement ]]</nowiki> / <nowiki>[[  http:--loco.ubuntu.com-events-ubuntu-ko-3772-ubuntu-fest- | View at LoCo Portal]]</nowiki> / <nowiki>[[ https:--photos.app.goo.gl-3WWR2UxicaF1VEYR8 | Photos]]</nowiki>
* Report : <nowiki>[[ http:--blog.ubuntu-kr.org-2018-06-25-ubuntu-fest-en.html | Blog Post ]]</nowiki>
* Mijung Jeon talked about Embedding deep learning on mobile app using Core ML and Keras.
* Geunsoo Shin introduced about MQTT protocol, the social media of machines.
* Haryun Shin introduced about how to introduce hardware development process in start-up.
* Hanwook Kim introduced about Code-based design and Model-based design then described them by comparing them.
